#summary Overview of the sample robots included with RobotiTalk

= Introduction =

RobotiTalk includes several sample robots that you can use as examples for how to build your own custom robots for use with RobotiTalk.


= SampleRobots =

|| Robot Name || Has Custom Class || Has Custom UI ||
|| LEDCounter01 || Yes || No ||
|| GpsRobot || Yes || Yes ||

  * *LEDCounter01* - A simple blah.
  * *GpsRobot* - A robot that reads and parses raw NMEA GPS data from a GPS receiver and displays that data in a custom UI. Uses the [http://code.google.com/p/gpstalk/ Sicily.Gps] library.
